status.description: The condition of a process or response

processing_time.description: The time elapsed in processing the transaction

echo.description: A structure that contains transaction ID information

transaction_id.description: An ID that represents an API transaction

provider_timestamp.description: Store a related timestamp for reporting and troubleshooting purposes

provider_transaction_id.description: Secondary transaction identifier (generated by a provider)

rtoken.description: A Galileo-generated ID used for tracking

errors.description: A list of errors generated while the request was processed

response_data.description: A structure for the response data. In case of error it will be empty.

destination_account_id.description: UUID that identifies the destination account in the Galileo system.

post.description: Use the Create Destination Account endpoint to create an account at an external bank for wires. In some cases, it is necessary to also configure an intermediary bank. See Creating a Wire Transfer for more information.

apiLogin.description:
Web service username, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 50 characters
Example: `"AbC123-9999"`

apiTransKey.description:
Web service password, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 15 characters
Example: `"4sb62fh6w4h7w34g"`

providerId.description:
Galileo-issued provider identifier.
Pattern: Max 10 digits
Example: `9999`

transactionId.description:
A unique provider-generated ID to identify this API call. A UUID is preferred.
Pattern: 60 characters or less
Example: `"9845dk-39fdk3fj3-4483483478"`

accountNo.description:
The <<glossary:PRN>> or <<glossary:PAN>> of the account.
Pattern: PAN or PRN 
Example: `"074103447228"`

destinationName.description:
Display name for the remote account.
Pattern: Max 34 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"Celia College Fund"`

destinationBankName.description:
Name of the bank where the remote account is housed.
Pattern: Max 34 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"Bailey Building & Loan"`

destinationBankStandardRouting.description:
Standard routing number for `destinationBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9 digits
Example: `"124001545"`

destinationBankWireRouting.description:
Wire routing number for `destinationBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9 digits
Example: `"124001545"`

destinationBankAddress.description:
Address of `destinationBankName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"1655 Crimson Bay Dr, Scarletville, UT, 84933"`

intermediaryBankName.description:
Name of the intermediary bank.
Pattern: Max 34 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"Orchid National Bank"`

intermediaryBankWireRouting.description:
Wire routing number for `intermediaryBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9 digits
Example: `"124001545"`

intermediaryBankAddress.description:
Address of `intermediaryBankName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"843 S. Orchid Way, Violetburg, UT, 84611"`

destinationAccountNumber.description:
Account number at `destinationBankName`, either domestic or <<glossary:IBAN>>.
Pattern: Max 34 characters (IBAN) or 812 digits (domestic)
Example: `"4483434234348"`

destinationAccountName.description:
Name on the account in `destinationAccountNumber`.
Pattern: Max 34 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"Celia Andrade"`

destinationAccountAddress.description:
Address of the person or entity in `destinationAccountName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"335 W Cerulean St., Blueville, UT 84530"`

destinationAccountType.description:
Type of the external bank account:
* `C` — Checking
* `S` — Savings
* `M` — Money market

Pattern: `C`, `S` or `M`
Example: `"C"`

status_code.description: The response status code. May return a string for some statuses.

status.description: The condition of a process or response

processing_time.description: The time elapsed in processing the transaction

transaction_id.description: An ID that represents an API transaction

rtoken.description: A Galileo-generated ID used for tracking

errors.description: A list of errors generated while the request was processed

response_data.description: A structure for the response data. In case of error it will be empty.

destination_account_id.description: UUID that identifies the destination account in the Galileo system.

post.description: Use the Remove Destination Account endpoint to delete a remote bank account that was created for wires.

post.description: Use the Modify Destination Account endpoint to update an existing external bank account that sends and receives wires.Only pass the parameter(s) to modify. Do not pass parameters with `null` or empty values.

apiLogin.description:
Web service username, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 50 characters
Example: `"AbC123-9999"`

apiTransKey.description:
Web service password, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 15 characters
Example: `"4sb62fh6w4h7w34g"`

providerId.description:
Galileo-issued provider identifier.
Pattern: Max 10 digits
Example: `9999`

transactionId.description:
A unique provider-generated ID to identify this API call. A UUID is preferred.
Pattern: 60 characters or less
Example: `"9845dk-39fdk3fj3-4483483478"`

accountNo.description:
The <<glossary:PRN>> or <<glossary:PAN>> of the account.
Pattern: PAN or PRN 
Example: `"074103447228"`

destinationAccountId.description: The `destination_account_id` as returned by Create Destination Account or Get Destination Accounts Pattern: UUID Example: `"dcf0ef1d-6387-42f8-88cc-292f1c90cd67"`

destinationName.description:
Display name for the remote account.
Pattern: Alphanumeric and punctuation, max 34 characters
Example: `"Celia College Fund"`

destinationBankName.description:
Name of the bank where the remote account is housed.
Pattern: Alphanumeric and punctuation, max 34 characters
Example: `"Bailey Building & Loan"`

destinationBankStandardRouting.description:
Standard routing number for `destinationBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9-digit routing number, including check digit
Example: `"124001545"`

destinationBankWireRouting.description:
Wire routing number for `destinationBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9-digit wire routing number, including check digit
Example: `"124001545"`

destinationBankAddress.description:
Address of `destinationBankName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"1655 Crimson Bay Dr, Scarletville, UT, 84933"`

intermediaryBankName.description:
Name of the intermediary bank.
Pattern: Alphanumeric and punctuation, max 34 characters
Example: `"Orchid National Bank`

intermediaryBankWireRouting.description:
Wire routing number for `intermediaryBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9-digit wire routing number, including check digit
Example: `"124001545"`

intermediaryBankAddress.description:
Address of `intermediaryBankName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: "843 S. Orchid Way, Violetburg, UT, 84611"

destinationAccountNumber.description:
Account number at `destinationBankName`, either U.S. or <<glossary:IBAN>>.
Pattern: Max 34 characters if IBAN, 8–12 digits if U.S. account number
Example: `"4483434234348"`

destinationAccountName.description:
Name on the account in `destinationAccountNumber`.
Pattern: Alphanumeric and punctuation, max 34 characters
Example: `"Celia Andrade"`

destinationAccountAddress.description:
Address of the person or entity in `destinationAccountName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"335 W Cerulean St., Blueville, UT 84030"`

destinationAccountType.description:
Type of the external bank account:
* `C` — Checking
* `S` — Savings
* `M` — Money market

Pattern: `C`, `S`, or `M`
Example: `"C"`

post.description: Use the Get Destination Accounts endpoint to retrieve a list of remote accounts that were created by Create Destination Account for the specified `accountNo`. See Record-Set Pagination for instructions on using the paging parameters.

apiLogin.description:
Web service username, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 50 characters
Example: `"AbC123-9999"`

apiTransKey.description:
Web service password, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 15 characters
Example: `"4sb62fh6w4h7w34g"`

providerId.description:
Galileo-issued provider identifier.
Pattern: Max 10 digits
Example: `9999`

transactionId.description:
A unique provider-generated ID to identify this API call. A UUID is preferred.
Pattern: 60 characters or less
Example: `"9845dk-39fdk3fj3-4483483478"`

accountNo.description:
The <<glossary:PRN>> or <<glossary:PAN>> of the account.
Pattern: PAN or PRN 
Example: `"074103447228"`

maxRecords.description:
Maximum number of records per page to return. Default: 100
Pattern: Integer max 200
Example: `50`

nextPageToken.description:
Pass the `next_page_token` from a previous response to return the next page, or pass `Null` or empty string to get the first page.
Pattern: String

status_code.description: The response status code. May return a string for some statuses.

status.description: The condition of a process or response

processing_time.description: The time elapsed in processing the transaction

echo.description: A structure that contains transaction ID information

transaction_id.description: An ID that represents an API transaction

provider_timestamp.description: Store a related timestamp for reporting and troubleshooting purposes

provider_transaction_id.description: Secondary transaction identifier (generated by a provider)

rtoken.description: A Galileo-generated ID used for tracking

errors.description: A list of errors generated while the request was processed

response_data.description: A structure for the response data. In case of error it will be empty.

balance.description: Balance of the account after the transaction.

expected_transfer_date.description: Date that the recipient should receive the transfer. Should be the same day the wire is sent, unless the bank sends the transaction after the Fedwire cutoff time, in which case the date is the next business day.

post.description: Use the Create Wire Transaction endpoint to initiate a wire transfer to a remote bank account. Prior to using this endpoint, you must create an account to receive the wire using Create Destination Account. After successfully calling this endpoint, there is a 10-minute window during which you can cancel the wire using Cancel Wire Transaction.

apiLogin.description:
Web service username, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 50 characters
Example: `"AbC123-9999"`

apiTransKey.description:
Web service password, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 15 characters
Example: `"4sb62fh6w4h7w34g"`

providerId.description:
Galileo-issued provider identifier.
Pattern: Max 10 digits
Example: `9999`

transactionId.description:
A unique provider-generated ID to identify this API call. A UUID is preferred.
Pattern: 60 characters or less
Example: `"9845dk-39fdk3fj3-4483483478"`

accountNo.description:
The <<glossary:PRN>> or <<glossary:PAN>> of the account.
Pattern: PAN or PRN 
Example: `"074103447228"`

amount.description:
Currency amount as a whole or decimal amount.
Pattern: Positive integer or decimal number
Example: `100.00`, `100`, or `100.73`

destinationAccountId.description: `destination_account_id` as returned by Create Destination Account or Get Destination Accounts. Pattern: UUID Example: `"dcf0ef1d-6387-42f8-88cc-292f1c90cd67"`

reference.description:
Description for the wire transaction.
Pattern: Max 140 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"PMT FOR EQUIPMENT"`

response_data.description: A structure for the response data. In case of error it will be empty.

balance.description: Balance of the account after canceling the transaction

post.description: Use the Cancel Wire Transaction endpoint to cancel a wire transaction that was initiated by the Create Wire Transaction endpoint. The wire transaction can be canceled within 10 minutes of being created with that endpoint. If the wire cannot be canceled, this endpoint returns `status_code: 27 Request cannot be completed`, which means that the transaction is being processed and cannot be canceled.

apiLogin.description:
Web service username, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 50 characters
Example: `"AbC123-9999"`

apiTransKey.description:
Web service password, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 15 characters
Example: `"4sb62fh6w4h7w34g"`

providerId.description:
Galileo-issued provider identifier.
Pattern: Max 10 digits
Example: `9999`

transactionId.description:
A unique provider-generated ID to identify this API call. A UUID is preferred.
Pattern: 60 characters or less
Example: `"9845dk-39fdk3fj3-4483483478"`

accountNo.description:
The <<glossary:PRN>> or <<glossary:PAN>> of the account.
Pattern: PAN or PRN 
Example: `"074103447228"`

wireTransactionId.description: `wire_transaction_id` as returned by Create Wire Transaction or Get Wire History. Pattern: UUID Example: `"dcf0ef1d-6387-42f8-88cc-292f1c90cd67"`

status_code.description: The response status code. May return a string for some statuses.

status.description: The condition of a process or response

echo.description: A structure that contains transaction ID information

transaction_id.description: An ID that represents an API transaction

provider_timestamp.description: Store a related timestamp for reporting and troubleshooting purposes

provider_transaction_id.description: Secondary transaction identifier (generated by a provider)

rtoken.description: A Galileo-generated ID used for tracking

errors.description: A list of errors generated while the request was processed

response_data.description: A structure for the response data. In case of error it will be empty.

status.description: Status of the transaction. See the [Transaction statuses](#transaction-statuses) table for valid values.

receive_date.description: Date the transaction was received by file or API

deb_cred_ind.description: Whether the transaction was a `credit` or `debit`

imad.description: _Incoming only._ Input message accountability data, a 22-character universally unique identifier that Fedwire assigns to each wire transfer.  The first eight characters are the date of the transfer: YYYYMMDD.

payment_id.description: _Incoming only._ ID of the payment in the payments table

sender.description: _Incoming only._ Information about who sent the transaction

account.description: Account number of the sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing).

address.description: Address of the sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing).

bank.description: Name of the ODFI (incoming) or RDFI (outgoing)

country.description: Country of the ODFI (incoming) or RDFI (outgoing)

name.description: Name of the wire sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing)

adjustment_id.description: _Outgoing only._ ID of the adjustment in the adjustments table

receiver.description: _Outgoing only._ Information about who received the transaction

account.description: Account number of the sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing).

address.description: Address of the sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing).

bank.description: Name of the ODFI (incoming) or RDFI (outgoing)

country.description: Country of the ODFI (incoming) or RDFI (outgoing)

name.description: Name of the wire sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing)

post.description: Use the Get Wire Details endpoint to retrieve information about a specific wire transaction that was initiated by Create Wire Transaction or retrieved by Get Wire History.

Web service username, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 50 characters
Example: `"AbC123-9999"`

apiTransKey.description:
Web service password, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 15 characters
Example: `"4sb62fh6w4h7w34g"`

providerId.description:
Galileo-issued provider identifier.
Pattern: Max 10 digits
Example: `9999`

transactionId.description:
A unique provider-generated ID to identify this API call. A UUID is preferred.
Pattern: 60 characters or less
Example: `"9845dk-39fdk3fj3-4483483478"`

accountNo.description:
The <<glossary:PRN>> or <<glossary:PAN>> of the account.
Pattern: PAN or PRN 
Example: `"074103447228"`

wireTransactionId.description: `wire_transaction_id` as returned by Create Wire Transaction or Get Wire History. Pattern: UUID Example: `"dcf0ef1d-6387-42f8-88cc-292f1c90cd67"`

end_date.description: End date of the transaction history. Echo of `endDate`, if provided.

post.description: Use the Get Wire History endpoint to retrieve a list of wire transfers related to the specified account. If you do not populate `startDate` and `endDate`, the endpoint returns wires from the last 30 days. See Record-Set Pagination for instructions on using the paging parameters.

apiLogin.description:
Web service username, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 50 characters
Example: `"AbC123-9999"`

apiTransKey.description:
Web service password, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 15 characters
Example: `"4sb62fh6w4h7w34g"`

providerId.description:
Galileo-issued provider identifier.
Pattern: Max 10 digits
Example: `9999`

transactionId.description:
A unique provider-generated ID to identify this API call. A UUID is preferred.
Pattern: 60 characters or less
Example: `"9845dk-39fdk3fj3-4483483478"`

accountNo.description:
The <<glossary:PRN>> or <<glossary:PAN>> of the account.
Pattern: PAN or PRN 
Example: `"074103447228"`

startDate.description:
The beginning date for the date range, either a date or a date-time. Default: 31 days prior to today's date.
Pattern: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss
Example: `2025-07-12` or `2025-07-12 16:20:00`

endDate.description:
The end date for the date range, either a date or a date-time. Must be equal to or later than `startDate`. Max 1098 days (~3 years) after `startDate`. Default: End of today.
 Pattern: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss
Example: `2025-07-12` or `2025-07-12 16:20:00`

direction.description:
Which direction to return: `in`, `out` or `both`
Pattern: `in`, `out`, `both`
Example: `"in"`

maxTransactions.description:
Maximum number of transactions per page to return. Default: 100 
Pattern: Integer, max 200
Example: 50

nextPageToken.description:
Pass the `next_page_token` from the previous response to return the next page.
Pattern: Token string

apiLogin.description:
Web service username, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 50 characters
Example: `"AbC123-9999"`

apiTransKey.description:
Web service password, as provided by Galileo.
Pattern: Max 15 characters
Example: `"4sb62fh6w4h7w34g"`

providerId.description:
Galileo-issued provider identifier.
Pattern: Max 10 digits
Example: `9999`

transactionId.description:
A unique provider-generated ID to identify this API call. A UUID is preferred.
Pattern: 60 characters or less
Example: `"9845dk-39fdk3fj3-4483483478"`

accountNo.description:
The <<glossary:PRN>> or <<glossary:PAN>> of the account.
Pattern: PAN or PRN 
Example: `"074103447228"`

destinationName.description:
Display name for the remote account.
Pattern: Max 34 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"Celia College Fund"`

destinationBankName.description:
Name of the bank where the remote account is housed.
Pattern: Max 34 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"Bailey Building & Loan"`

destinationBankStandardRouting.description:
Standard routing number for `destinationBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9 digits
Example: `"124001545"`

destinationBankWireRouting.description:
Wire routing number for `destinationBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9 digits
Example: `"124001545"`

destinationBankSwiftBic.description:
The <<glossary:SWIFT>>/<<glossary:BIC>> code for `destinationBankName` for non-domestic destinations.
Pattern: 8–11 alphanumeric
Example: `"UTWOUS55XXX"`

destinationBankAddress.description:
Address of `destinationBankName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"1655 Crimson Bay Dr, Scarletville, UT, 84933"`

intermediaryBankName.description:
Name of the intermediary bank.
Pattern: Max 34 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"Orchid National Bank"`

intermediaryBankWireRouting.description:
Wire routing number for `intermediaryBankName`. Galileo validates the check digit.
Pattern: 9 digits
Example: `"124001545"`

intermediaryBankSwiftBic.description:
The SWIFT/BIC code for `intermediaryBankName`, if it is foreign relative to the wire originator.
Pattern: 8–11 alphanumeric
Example: `"BNMXMXMMXXX"`

intermediaryBankAddress.description:
Address of `intermediaryBankName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"843 S. Orchid Way, Violetburg, UT, 84611"`

destinationAccountNumber.description:
Account number at `destinationBankName`, either domestic or <<glossary:IBAN>>.
Pattern: Max 34 characters (IBAN) or 812 digits (domestic)
Example: `"4483434234348"`

destinationAccountName.description:
Name on the account in `destinationAccountNumber`.
Pattern: Max 34 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"Celia Andrade"`

destinationAccountAddress.description:
Address of the person or entity in `destinationAccountName`.
Pattern: Max 105 alphanumeric, punctuation
Example: `"335 W Cerulean St., Blueville, UT 84530"`

destinationAccountType.description:
Type of the external bank account:
* `C` — Checking
* `S` — Savings
* `M` — Money market

Pattern: `C`, `S` or `M`
Example: `"C"`

end_date.description: End date of the transaction history. Echo of `endDate`, if provided.

transactions.description: List of the wire transactions, ordered most recent first

wire_transaction_id.description: UUID that identifies the wire transaction

receive_date.description: Date that the wire was received

direction.description: Whether the wire was incoming or outgoing

status.description: Status of the wire transaction

sender.description: _Incoming only._ Information about who sent the transaction

account.description: Account number of the sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing).

address.description: Address of the sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing).

bank.description: Name of the ODFI (incoming) or RDFI (outgoing)

country.description: Country of the ODFI (incoming) or RDFI (outgoing)

name.description: Name of the wire sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing)

receiver.description: _Outgoing only._ Information about who received the transaction

account.description: Account number of the sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing).

address.description: Address of the sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing).

bank.description: Name of the ODFI (incoming) or RDFI (outgoing)

country.description: Country of the ODFI (incoming) or RDFI (outgoing)

name.description: Name of the wire sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing)

next_page_token.description: Token to use to retrieve the next page. When this field is missing, there are no more pages to return.
